sentences.sContent: a hot dog with mustard and relish
sentences.sCn: 配芥末酱和调味汁的热狗

synos.tran: 滋味；风味；食欲；开胃小菜；含义

remMethod.val: rel(看作real， 真的) ＋ ish(使) → 真人无名， 真水无香， 当为享受人生的最高境界 → 享受

trans.tranOther: to enjoy an experience or the thought of something that is going to happen

trans.tranCn: 享受， 滋味， 乐趣； 调味品
